title: These are the best of the best products at MWC 2022!
content:
The Mobile World Congress (MWC) trade show in Barcelona is usually the most happening smartphone event of the year. But, over the last two years, things haven’t been as busy. Thankfully, this year’s event was much better than anticipated as we are back to doing a physical trade show. Many OEMs took to the show

The post These are the best of the best products at MWC 2022! appeared first on xda-developers.
description: MWC 2022 returned to its physical format, and we got to experience many new phones, laptops, and other cool tech. Here's the best of MWC 2022!
